name: EKRecurrenceRule
desc: A class that describes the recurrence pattern for a recurring event.

items.name: enum EKSpan
items.desc: An object that indicates whether modifications should apply to a single event or all future events of a recurring event.

items.name: init(recurrenceWith: EKRecurrenceFrequency, interval: Int, end: EKRecurrenceEnd?)
items.desc: Initializes and returns a simple recurrence rule with a given frequency, interval, and end.

items.name: init(recurrenceWith: EKRecurrenceFrequency, interval: Int, daysOfTheWeek: [EKRecurrenceDayOfWeek]?, daysOfTheMonth: [NSNumber]?, monthsOfTheYear: [NSNumber]?, weeksOfTheYear: [NSNumber]?, daysOfTheYear: [NSNumber]?, setPositions: [NSNumber]?, end: EKRecurrenceEnd?)
items.desc: Initializes and returns a recurrence rule with a given frequency and additional scheduling information.

items.name: var calendarIdentifier: String
items.desc: The identifier for the recurrence rule’s calendar.

items.name: var recurrenceEnd: EKRecurrenceEnd?
items.desc: Indicates when the recurrence rule ends.

items.name: var frequency: EKRecurrenceFrequency
items.desc: The frequency of the recurrence rule.

items.name: var interval: Int
items.desc: Specifies how often the recurrence rule repeats over the unit of time indicated by its frequency.

items.name: var firstDayOfTheWeek: Int
items.desc: Indicates which day of the week the recurrence rule treats as the first day of the week.

items.name: var daysOfTheWeek: [EKRecurrenceDayOfWeek]?
items.desc: The days of the week associated with the recurrence rule, as an array of EKRecurrenceDayOfWeek objects.

items.name: var daysOfTheMonth: [NSNumber]?
items.desc: The days of the month associated with the recurrence rule, as an array of NSNumber objects.

items.name: var daysOfTheYear: [NSNumber]?
items.desc: The days of the year associated with the recurrence rule, as an array of NSNumber objects.

items.name: var weeksOfTheYear: [NSNumber]?
items.desc: The weeks of the year associated with the recurrence rule, as an array of NSNumber objects.

items.name: var monthsOfTheYear: [NSNumber]?
items.desc: The months of the year associated with the recurrence rule, as an array of NSNumber objects.

items.name: var setPositions: [NSNumber]?
items.desc: An array of ordinal numbers that filters which recurrences to include in the recurrence rule’s frequency.
